title: What's the name of that old PC game with a girl protagonist that punches mushrooms in order to go down a level? I also remember the soundtrack being Edvard Grieg’s In the Hall of the Mountain King. - Quora

response.answer_text: Mountain King?  It was on the Commodore 64 and VIC-20, so definitely an old PC game.
I FOUND IT! It’s Shroomz: Quest for Puppy!
